original_text: Kohath's clan had to put up their tents on the south side of the tabernacle.
korean_text: 고핫 자손의 종족들은 성막 남쪽에 진을 칠 것이요

sentences.original_text: Kohath's clan had to put up their tents
sentences.korean_translation: 고핫 씨족은 그들의 천막을 치해야 했습니다

sentences.original_text: on the south side of the tabernacle
